content.rendered:
Directed by Reinaldo Marcus Green.

Written by Justin Fenton. George Pelecanos. George Pelecanos. David Simon. David Simon. Ed Burns. William F. Zorzi. D. Watkins.

Cast  Wunmi Mosaku( Nicole Steele ) . Jamie Hector( Sean Suiter ) . Josh Charles( Daniel Hersl ) . McKinley Belcher III( Momodu ‘G Money’ Gondo ) . Darrell Britt-Gibson( Jemell Rayam ) . David Corenswet( David McDougall ) . Dagmara Domin/epczyk( Erika Jensen ) . Don Harvey( John Sieracki ) . Larry Mitchell( Scott Kilpatrick ) . Delaney Williams( Kevin Davis ) . Lucas Van Engen( Leo Wise ) . Ian Duff( Ahmed Jackson ) . Rob Brown( Maurice Ward ) . Ham Mukasa( Evodio Hendrix ) . Robert Harley( Marcus Taylor ) . Seth Hurwitz( Donald Stepp ) . Celeste Oliva( Marjorie German ) . Ken Arnold( Charlie Gibson ) . Joey Palestina( Michael Fries ) . Bobby J. Brown( Thomas Allers ) . Christopher R. Anderson( Dean Palmere ) . Ryan Scott Thomas( David Bomenka ) . Eoin O’Shea( Keith Gladstone ) . Sylvester Lee Kirk( Glenn Wells ) . Rupal Pujara( Vanita Gupta ) . Aristeo F. Kardi( Ryan Guinn ) . Antoinette Greene( Catherine Pugh ) . Russ Widdall( Riggs ) . Justin Fenton( Justin Fenton ) . D’Angelo Woods( Snell ) . Nathan Corbett( Tariq TourÃ© ) . Dave Johnson( Brad Rosenthal ) . David McDougall( Older Patrolman ) . LeVar Lewis Jr.( Man #1 ) . Dawn A. Douglas( Woman ) . Michael Lamanna( Shift Lieutenant ) . Kevin Murray( Gary Proctor ) . Melvin T. Russell( Aaron ‘Black’ Anderson ) . Victor Dobro( John Clewell ) . Imani Nia Robinson( Nicole Suiter ) . Paige Carter( Stephanie Rawlings-Blake ) . Tim McAdams( Oreese Stevenson ) . Domenick Lombardozzi( Stephen Brady ) . Jermaine Crawford( Jaquan Dixon ) . I.O. Browne( Lekyla Whitaker ) . Giuseppe Ardizzone( Aaron Soler ) . Susan Rome( Meghan Morrison ) . Kim Tuvin( Judge Reed ) . Paula Black( Amy ) . Anwan Glover( David Baker ) . Joy Jones( Tisha Edwards ) . Christopher Kauffman( Steven Hale Levin ) . Joe Medina( Diego Richardson ) . Zach Ruchkin( Nicolas Deforge ) . Robert Poletick( Larry Nathans ) . Prentiss Watson( Ronald Hamilton ) . Edward Dixon( Davon ‘Wooda’ Robinson ) . Bru Aju( Stanley Willis ) . Sean W. Ryal( Ivan Bates ) . Ralph F. Horton II( Shawn Conley ) . Norman Jackson( Umar Burley ) . Jeremy Gabriel( Pete Gallagher ) . D. Watkins( D. Watkins ) . Kathryn Klvana( Judge Catherine C. Blake ) . David Hammond( Ed Barber ) . Mike Sutton( Rod Rosenstein ) . James Lewis( Judge Franklin Moore ) . Jerry Martin( Judge Leary ) . Brian Anthony Wilson( Andre Davis ) . Young Moose( Young Moose ) . Claude Stark( Paul Enzinna ) . Ian Cumberpatch( Logan Adams ) . Mark McKinnon( Officer Miles ) . Michael J. Lyons( Jim Smith ) . Jesse Milliner( Ed Zoller ) . Evan Casey( Jeremy Eldridge ) . Phillip Gilliam( Charles Lee ) . Michael Everett Johnson( Billy Finch ) . Dwayne A. Thomas( Kevin Haughton ) . Greg Lang( State Trooper ) . Nick Paglino( Mr. Wise ) . Ean A. Coe( Damien ) . Michael Salconi( Drummond ) . Graham Wolfe( Ben Frieman ) . Terri O’Neill( Linda Nelson ) . Bob Heath( Richard D. Bennett ) . Maria Broom( Rose Greene ) . Shalet Monique( Te’ana ) . George Pelecanos( Cokinos ) . Kenneth Wayne( Det. Michael Sylvester ) . Donnell Johnson( Jimmie Griffin ) . Keith Galeano( Ian Shields ) . Ricardo Kingsbury( Darryl De Soursa ) . Bernard M. May( Greg Hinton ) . Melan Perez( Mary Copeland ) . Steve Polites( Unit Leader ) . Jason M. Jones( Richard Miller ) . Lorenzo D. Mathis( Driver ) . John A. Griffin IV( Darius ) . Keith Villones( Patrolman ) . Emmanuel Kerry( Sergeant ) . Maurice Philogene( Command Staff Officer ) . Matthew Brent( Jail Guard ) . Anthony Maggio( Tim Jacobs ) . Keon Clayton( Vinson ) . Marcellus Bassman Shepard( Gordon Johnson ) . Steven Maurice( Boyd ) . Michael Darnell Croxton( Gary Brown ) . Andre Bonaparte( Walsh ) . Mary Ataku( Ebony Harris ) . Nick Scalise( IAD Officer #1 ) . Lawrence Redmond( Defense Attorney ) . Ariel McCullough( Domin/epique Jarvis ) . Aaron Grady Shaw( Robert Lee ) . Scott Charles Blamphin( Bill Burns )

Language English.

Producers Kary Antholis. Ed Burns. Mara Goodman. Reinaldo Marcus Green. Heather Levenstone. John Mabry. Nina K. Noble. George Pelecanos. Reena Rexrode. David Simon. Karen L. Thorson. William F. Zorzi.

Production Crime Story Media. Home Box Office (HBO).

Number of Seasons 1

Number of Episodes 6

Status Finished (2022–2022)
